RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 1 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 49. Maiden Claiming Purse 10000. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GRACE'S SOLDIER broke with the leaders, allowed the early pace to go in the run up the backstretch, between horses in the second flight through the turn, came three wide for the drive, closed with good late energy to win going away. EARLY DAWN broke through the gate prior to the start, reloaded in good order, away well, set a pressured pace for three furlongs closest to the inside, shook clear in upper stretch, extended that advantage past the furlong marker, proved no match for the winner late, clearly second best. PINTORA bothered at the start to be away tardily, improved toward the inside turn, in striking position upper stretch, lacked a closing punch while saving the show. KASENS TRIBE off slowly, remained devoid of speed for three furlongs, lodged a willingly rally inside and through traffic to be gaining for the show. SPARKLE CITY raced in mid pack off the inside, roused when angling out five wide into the stretch, improved a bit past the furlong marker then was flat the final sixteenth. SUNSET FLASH lacked speed for three furlongs off the inside, five wide into the lane, improved position and also went a bit flat late. GLITZ AND GLAMOUR broke out but alertly to bother PINTORA, was straightened and pressed the runner up off the inside for three furlongs and gave way. LUCCA'S LILYBY broke back, raced four wide through the turn, picked off a couple of tiring rivals while not a threat. TIZ A BREAKUP failed to menace. NIKLAUSIA was finished early. SHARE THE DOE forwardly placed early outside, tired while four wide into the stretch. PLEADING GUILTY fanned six wide exiting the turn, also tired.

ENTRY.NAME: Niklausia
ENTRY.COMMENT: finished early

ENTRY.NAME: Early Dawn
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk thru gate, set pace, shook clear, no match late

ENTRY.NAME: Tiz a Breakup
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace

ENTRY.NAME: Kasens Tribe
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slowly, trailed, late rally through traffic

ENTRY.NAME: Glitz and Glamour
ENTRY.OWNER: White Raymond Todd and Coker Duane
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out but alertly, pressed 2p, gave way

ENTRY.NAME: Pintora
ENTRY.COMMENT: bothered start,improved turn, saved show

ENTRY.NAME: Grace's Soldier
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke with leaders, 2nd flight btwn foes turn, 3w,going away late

ENTRY.NAME: Sunset Flash
ENTRY.COMMENT: lacked speed off rail, 5w into lane, improved

ENTRY.NAME: Share the Doe
ENTRY.OWNER: Sebastian J Ronald and Sebastian Linda P
ENTRY.COMMENT: forwardly placed outside, tired four wide

ENTRY.NAME: Lucca's Lilyby
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke back, four wide turn, passed tiring ones

ENTRY.NAME: Sparkle City
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack off rail, roused 5w into lane, evenly final furlong

ENTRY.NAME: Pleading Guilty
ENTRY.COMMENT: fanned 6w into lane, tired

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 2 7 1/2F Turf CR: 74. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 36000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $50,000 WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Other Than Claiming Allowed 3 lb s. Claiming Price $50,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SIKARA SIKARA settled off the pace, moved closer in the second turn, moved out a bit and challenged between the two leaders approaching the furlong grounds, edged clear under steady handling. NODAH took control past the wire the first time, dueled the middle part closest to the inside, could not match the winner late, held sway for the place. BANDIT'S PRIDE pressed the runner up early from the outside, moved up to duel before half, got out a bit into the lane affording the winner a large opening, weakened a bit to finish up best of the rest. MUCHMORETHANREADY last to leave, lacked speed, saved ground, displayed a mild amount of late interest to better position. SCARLET STORM in mid pack while out in the course early, pulled in the run up the backstretch, came up empty for the drive. THE CALLING STONE hopped at the start, back off the pace, failed to muster a closing response. STARSHIP JAMBALAYA forwardly placed for a half, faded.

ENTRY.NAME: Muchmorethanready
ENTRY.OWNER: Dare To Dream Stable LLC (Michael Faber)
ENTRY.COMMENT: last to leave, trailed, mild late interest toward the inside

ENTRY.NAME: The Calling Stone
ENTRY.COMMENT: hopped start, lacked response

ENTRY.NAME: Nodah
ENTRY.COMMENT: showed way early,dueled inside, saved 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Bandit's Pride
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed off the inside, dueled, got out bit into lane, best rest

ENTRY.NAME: Starship Jambalaya
ENTRY.COMMENT: forward for a half, faded

ENTRY.NAME: Sikara Sikara
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled off pace, closer 2nd turn, bid btwn, edged clear

ENTRY.NAME: Scarlet Storm
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, one paced, pulled backstretch, empty drive

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 3 5F Dirt CR: 59. Claiming Purse 13000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CRYPTO BRAVE settled off the pace and the inside, asked along midway on the turn, behind some traffic into the lane, shifted out for room when straightened for home, closed with good resolve to be up in time. ROADSIDE GIRL forwardly placed inside, advanced on the leader and challenged inside that one past the furlong marker, led late, could not contain the winner. TROSKA back off the pace, moved out, swung five wide out of the turn, rallied down the middle of the strip to finish willingly and to be getting to the runer up late. ROARING QUINN in the second flight outside, four wide through the turn, drifted in behind some traffic midstretch, finished up evenly. MARINA broke alertly, soon sprinted clear, set the pace, allowed the runner up the rail nearing midstretch, faltered when headed by that one. T J'S SUNSHINE broke back, lacked speed, raced four wide out of the turn, improved position with some belated interest. RESPECT ALL lacked speed, made little impact. ALL AMERICAN PAT in mid pack off the inside, checked up in some traffic entering the turn, fell back a bit, came five wide into the stretch, lacked a closing kick. TALENTS HOT DEAL chased the leader for three furlongs and gave way. BLUE RIDGE ROMANCE saved ground to no avail in remaining back. ASTRO FLASH broke back, was five wide into the turn, angled in a bit was was finished early.

ENTRY.NAME: Blue Ridge Romance
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground to no avail

ENTRY.NAME: T J's Sunshine
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke back, 4w into lane, improved with belated interest

ENTRY.NAME: Troska
ENTRY.COMMENT: back off the pace, moved out,swung 5w into lane, rallied midtrack

ENTRY.NAME: Roadside Girl
ENTRY.COMMENT: forwardly placed inside, inside bid 1/8, led, caught late

ENTRY.NAME: Talents Hot Deal
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased for three furlongs, gave way

ENTRY.NAME: Astro Flash
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke back,5w early turn, finished early

ENTRY.NAME: Crypto Brave
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled off pace, asked turn, shifted out 4w, up in time

ENTRY.NAME: All American Pat
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, traffic, checked up 7/16, 5w into lane, no kick

ENTRY.NAME: Respect All
ENTRY.COMMENT: lacked speed, made little impact

ENTRY.NAME: Marina
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke alertly, soon clear, pace, faltered when headed

ENTRY.NAME: Roaring Quinn
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2nd flight,4w turn, drifted in 1/8, even late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 94. Claiming Purse 16500. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE NOVEMBER 12, 2022. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 12, 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500. Louisiana B red Claiming Price $15,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MALIBU S S shuffled back a bit out of the chute to trail early, advanced three wide to challenge through the turn, extended duel through the stretch, narrowly gained the nod at the wire. MISCHIEF'S MACHINE forwardly placed in the run up the backstretch, challenged between foes into the lane, dueled inside the winner to the wire, proved stubborn to the wire to narrowly mis.l. BIND FAITH broke out, closest to the early leader while between foes backstretch, fell back turn, came four wide for the drive, finished up clear of the rest while not a threat to the top two. JOLLY TOMMY one paced toward the inside, lacked a serious closing response. JAZZ IT UP broke alertly, sprinted clear, showed the way into the turn, vied inside the top two into the stretch, faltered soon after. SPECIAL OPERATOR finished early, trailed home.

ENTRY.NAME: Jolly Tommy
ENTRY.OWNER: Campbell Heath Aaron and Campbell Sheena
ENTRY.COMMENT: one paced toward the inside

ENTRY.NAME: Special Operator
ENTRY.COMMENT: finished early, trailed home

ENTRY.NAME: Bind Faith
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased early, fell back turn, 4w into clear of rest

ENTRY.NAME: Jazz It Up
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke alertly, cleared, vied inside, faltered

ENTRY.NAME: Malibu S S
ENTRY.COMMENT: shuffled back bit early, trailed, 3w advance turn, long duel,nod

ENTRY.NAME: Mischief's Machine
ENTRY.COMMENT: forward early, bid between foes into lane, duel, stubborn,miss

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 5 1M Turf CR: 81. Starter Allowance Purse 18000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $5000 OR LESS IN ONE OF THEIR LAST FIVE STARTS. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since July 12, 2023 Allowed 3 l bs. Such A Race Since June 12, 2023 Allowed 5 lbs. (Claiming Races For $4,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: HAL'S DREAM unhurried early inside, crept closer while in hand before a half, slipped through along the rail under clever handling late in the final turn, challenged with a rail bid upper straight, edged clear late under steady handling. ANGEL OF VERDUN in the second flight while toward the inside, continued to stalk while in traffic late in the final turn, set down when clear in upper stretch, finished with good determination to annex the place. HONORARY GUEST settled in mid pack while off the inside, four wide exiting the final turn, displayed some late interest to improve position, not enough for the runner up spot in the final strides. DOLLY'S GUITAR took command past the wire the first time, set the pace while racing just off the inside, continued to show the way into the stretch, allowed the winner the inside soon after, gave ground grudgingly to that one until late. FOR REAL ALICE within striking distance, moved closer in the three path late in the final turn, failed to sustain that advance through the stretch. SAVVY SHIPMAN last away, trailed early, came three wide for the drive, angled in, improved position with some late interest. J Z'S FIRST void of speed, came five wide for the drive, went evenly the final furlong in lacking a late punch. MSCHITCHATTOUR remained back in failing to threaten. PROUD VICTORIA steadied in traffic soon after the start, lacked speed, in some additional traffic far turn, four wide into the lane, failed to mount a bid. CRIDER CHASE prompted the issue up front for almost six furlongs, had little left for the drive in giving way. LAKE RUNNER forwardly placed early, fell back steadily the second quarter, continued to fade and trailed in.

ENTRY.NAME: Savvy Shipman
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away, trailed, 3w into lane, angled in, improved

ENTRY.NAME: Angel of Verdun
ENTRY.OWNER: Peterson Stephen J and Peterson Konnor
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2nd flight toward rail, 2p into lane in traffic, asked,game 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Mschitchattour
ENTRY.COMMENT: remained back in failing to threaten

ENTRY.NAME: Hal's Dream
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried inside,closer in hand,slipped thru inside, rail bid,clr

ENTRY.NAME: Proud Victoria
ENTRY.COMMENT: steadied in traffic early, traffic again 3/8, 4w into lane,no bid

ENTRY.NAME: Dolly's Guitar
ENTRY.COMMENT: pace just off rail, grudgingly

ENTRY.NAME: J Z's First
ENTRY.COMMENT: void of speed, 5w into lane, evenly late

ENTRY.NAME: Crider Chase
ENTRY.COMMENT: prompted pace for 3/4, little left

ENTRY.NAME: Lake Runner
ENTRY.OWNER: Sharp Cynthia A and Richards Corale A
ENTRY.COMMENT: forward early, fell back, trailed in

ENTRY.NAME: Honorary Guest
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled in mid pack, 4w into lane, not enuf 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: For Real Alice
ENTRY.COMMENT: within striking distance, closer 3w into lane, flattened

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 75. Claiming Purse 10000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE FEBRUARY 12, 2023 OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE AUGUST 12, 2022. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 12, 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. A Race Since June 12, 2023 Allowed 5 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000. Louisiana Bred Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MARY JACK settled off the pace, asked along three to four wide turn, rallied widest down the lane and closed with good resolve to be up in time. TAYLOR'S SECRET forwardly placed, roused three wide into the lane, challenged outside the leader with a furlong to run, took over, led late, could not contain the winner. SWEET BAY lacked speed four a half off the inside, shaken up with a right handed crop into the lane, late rally to be in time for the show, not a threat to the top pair. BIND ON EARTH moved up to take control after the start, shook clear in the turn, offered brief resistance to the runner up when that one challenged from the outside past the furlong marker then faltered when headed by that same foe soon after. ITSNOTMYJOB raced three wide most of the way, lacked a serious closing response. LAURIEANN prompted the issue early, chased the leader through the turn then began to give way in upper strtch. COUNTRY DREAM was finished early while racing in the two path. BLONDIE LOX BABE fell back to trail after the start and was never a factor.

ENTRY.NAME: Mary Jack
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled off pace and rail, asked 3-4w late turn, rallied, in time

ENTRY.NAME: Country Dream
ENTRY.COMMENT: was finished before a half in the two path

ENTRY.NAME: Laurieann
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed early, chased turn, gave way drive

ENTRY.NAME: Sweet Bay
ENTRY.COMMENT: lacked speed for a half, asked, late rally, up show

ENTRY.NAME: Bind On Earth
ENTRY.COMMENT: moved up to set the pace, clear late turn, faltered when headed

ENTRY.NAME: Taylor's Secret
ENTRY.COMMENT: forwardly, roused 3w into lane, bid 1/8, led, caught late

ENTRY.NAME: Itsnotmyjob
ENTRY.COMMENT: three wide trip, lacked serious bid

ENTRY.NAME: Blondie Lox Babe
ENTRY.COMMENT: fell back to trail, never a factor

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 7 7 1/2F Turf CR: 70. Maiden Special Weight Purse 34000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. (Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less $20,000).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ROCKET DOCTOR behind the pace early inside, avoided a chain reaction of interference as a result, moved out backstretch, advanced three wide to challenge second turn, long drive to the wire, showed good determination late to prove best. HARD KINGS broke forwardly, came out to set off a chain reaction of interference into the first turn, recovered to race forwardly just ahead of the winner, briefly boxed inside that one turning for home, challenged between horses with a furlong to run, outdueled by the victor late, while edging clear for the second spot. SASSI D closest to the leader early, continued to pursue that one up the backstretch, challenged second turn, gained the advantage into the lane, was joined by the top two a furlong out, could not match that pair to the wire, well clear of the others. SYVESTAR in some early traffic past the wire the first time, six wide into the first turn, angled in, dropped all the way to the rail past the furlong marker, displayed a mild amount of late interest. MARVINS' POSSE carried very wide in that trouble in the first turn, angled in, went evenly in lacking a closing response. UNCLE HUTCH sprinted clear to set the early pace, continued to show the way up the backstretch, weakened when headed entering the stretch. SEA OF LIGHT took up across a rival's heels into the first turn, remained back after recovering. POPPA BEAR broke a step slow, failed to menace in lacking a closing response. INGLIS carried out into the first turn, remained wide, fell back and was well beaten. NOW NOW SAINT carried extremely wide as another victim of the incident in the first turn, fell back, lost contact with the field, distanced through the stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Rocket Doctor
ENTRY.COMMENT: behind pace inside, moved out, 3w bid into lane, long drive,best

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Adcock's Red River Farm, LLC & J. Adcock

ENTRY.NAME: Hard Kings
ENTRY.COMMENT: came out 3/4, forward, closer, bid btwn 1/8, outdueled late

ENTRY.NAME: Inglis
ENTRY.COMMENT: carried out, bothered into the first turn,remained wide

ENTRY.NAME: Uncle Hutch
ENTRY.COMMENT: sprinted clear early, pace, weakened when headed into lane

ENTRY.NAME: Syvestar
ENTRY.COMMENT: early traffic 6w mid pack, modest late interest

ENTRY.NAME: Sassi D
ENTRY.COMMENT: closest to leader, bid, led a furlong out, could not last

ENTRY.NAME: Sea of Light
ENTRY.COMMENT: took up across a rival's heels in the first turn, remained back

ENTRY.NAME: Poppa Bear
ENTRY.COMMENT: off step slow, failed to menace

ENTRY.NAME: Marvins' Posse
ENTRY.COMMENT: carried very wide first turn, mid pack, evenly

ENTRY.NAME: Now Now Saint
ENTRY.COMMENT: carried extremely wide first turn, lost contact, distanced

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 8 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 88. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 33000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, OR STATE BRED ALW SINCE FEBRUARY 10, 2023 OR CLAIMING PRICE $50,000. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Sinc e July 12, 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. A Race Since June 12, 2023 Allowed 5 lbs. Claiming Price $50,000 (Claiming Races Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ONEROLLOFTHEDICE broke back, moved up to race in the second flight, patiently handled toward the inside behind the lead group through the turn, moved out a lodged a bid between rivals nearing midstretch, spirited drive to the finish, proved game while still between horses at the wire. FLASHY MEG broke on top, narrowly set a pressured pace early, dueled into the lane, briefly garnered a larger advantage in upper stretch, responded when challenged not long after, proved stubborn to the end. MY FRIEND AMY back off the early pace, ranged up to a challenging position four wide by late in the turn, lodged a bid inside the furlong grounds, outfinished by the top two late. MARIAH'S CANDY pressed early between rivals and outside the winner, fell back a bit through the turn, went evenly through the lane. BROKE FINANCING pressed the issue up the backstretch three wide, moved to challenge and dueled outside the early leader late in the turn, weakened through the stretch. CAVE CREEK last away, trailed most of the way in failing to threaten. HALF PAGE remained back in lacking a closing bid.

ENTRY.NAME: Half Page
ENTRY.COMMENT: remained back in lacking a bid

ENTRY.NAME: Cave Creek
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away, trailed most of way

ENTRY.NAME: Flashy Meg
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke on top, narrowly set pace, long drive, stubbornly

ENTRY.NAME: Onerollofthedice
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke back, moved up 2nd flight, bid btwn, long drive, game

ENTRY.NAME: Mariah's Candy
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed between foes, fell back late turn, evenly drive

ENTRY.NAME: Broke Financing
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed 3w, bid, dueled into lane, faltered

ENTRY.NAME: My Friend Amy
ENTRY.COMMENT: back early, ranged up 4w late turn, outside bid, outkicked

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 9 1M Turf CR: 86. Claiming Purse 13500. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE NOVEMBER 12, 2022. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over On The Turf Since July 12, 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. Claim ing Price $7,500 (Claiming Races For $5,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances). Louisiana Bred Claiming Price $10,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CHAOSMOS moved up after the start to stalk the pace three wide, closest to the leader into the lane, wore that foe down under firm handling, took over then held the runner up safe late. ONE TIME GEM in the second flight off the inside, came four wide for the drive, set down, slowly getting to the winner late while outside that one. EGO last away, void of early foot, improved while saving ground into the lane, continued with mild interest to gain the show, not enough for the top two. STANDING MAN broke on top, set the pace along the inside, continued to hold a daylight advantage into the stretch, responded briefly when confronted inside the furlong grounds then faltered. JACI'S ROYALTY pressed the issue early, remained in a forward position the middle half, had little left for the drive. RUN ROCKET one placed throughout while well off the pace and the inside. WISH UPON A STAR broke back, lacked speed, made little impact while racing outside. PINCH ASSAULT was finished after a half. MORE LIKE IT stopped after four furlongs, finished far back.

ENTRY.NAME: Jaci's Royalty
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed early, remained forward, had little late

ENTRY.NAME: Standing Man
ENTRY.OWNER: Sharp Cynthia A and Richards Corale A
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke on top, pace, faltered late

ENTRY.NAME: Pinch Assault
ENTRY.COMMENT: was finished after half

ENTRY.NAME: Run Rocket
ENTRY.COMMENT: one paced throughout in lacking a closing response

ENTRY.NAME: One Time Gem
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2nd flight, 4w into lane, slowly gaining late

ENTRY.NAME: More Like It
ENTRY.COMMENT: stopped after four furlongs, far back

ENTRY.NAME: Chaosmos
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked 3w, closer into the lane, bid, held late

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: J. M. Herbener Jr. & Matthew R Herbener

ENTRY.NAME: Ego
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away, void of speed, advanced inside into lane, gained show

ENTRY.NAME: Wish Upon a Star
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke back, raced outside, no threat
